Blog.post: ..haiz~..nv knew tt frendship kind suxs man..2dae den found out kanna "cheated" by frend n grp..suckers..i will make sure tt i will cut their asses off n feed dem to de sharks man!!..so pissed off!!!!!!..dose jerks!..wish i could kill dem..ARGHH!!!!!...> > >nvm..life is like tt.we should juz accept..haiz!~!~!
2dae i went t0 cle0ne h0use...haha...so funny..went t0 eat in de end buy s0 many tings...lol..> > >use internet until 5+..k00l...lol....aniway mi gtg n0w...c ya later!~!~!

hi!~!~!..back again...juz came back frm whitesands..at least i f0und a place where i can spend my time d0ing sumting instead of lazying ar0und d0ing n0thing...n0w waiting f0r sh0w t0 start..> > >..still gt 30 min m0re...muz wait until 7 0'cl0ck...haiz~~~....

haiz~!~!....2dae v sian..suppose to play bball wif amelia n wei long but din..amelia had to her grandmother house den mi dun like to play wif boiz alone...so dun play lor...> > >now adding mi first blog...o0o0o0...sho happi!!..at least gt sumting 2 do..> >hahaha..maybe later going out to find sumting to do..sumting interesting...i tink i will stop here...later rite again...adoiz!~!~!

2dae suppose to have remedial for maths but i pon!!!..haha..den during nyaa..play bball wif jin keat..zhi yuan..gerald..wei sheng..nelson..amelia..qi hong..xueting..n others...so fun..until amelia so angry juz bcoz i snatched her ball..siao ah she..like tt oso angry...lucky she no high blood pressure..if not zao jiu die liao..after tt went to buy drink..rest for a while n went home...went hm tt time saw a collie!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!....SO CUTE!!!!!!!!!....ooooooooo....i'm in dreamland..2dae quite fun...a lot of xcercise been done...i wanna b fit!!

2dae woke up at .20 to meet joakey n xueting to go to bedok resorvoir( dunnoe to spell) for 2.4 km run..go there have to wait for 2hr for my class to run..so irritating..shit dem..but i happi coz i came in 33rd among more den 110 ppl...heheh..lol..after tt went to tampines interchange to eat at de food court..all of us eat yong tau foo..haha..den went to tampines mall to take neoprint..haha..v funni...de thing take de photo so fast until dunno wat pose to pose so anihow do..lol...but all came out v nice...so funni...laugh until like crazy..after tt went to joakey'z house..played game of life n all distribute de neoprint equally..joak n xueting laugh at mi coz i repaired de neoprint until like siao..cut until so exact..haha..so many rubbish..oso played abt writing 6 guy'z name on de mini whiteboardn 6 gurl'z name too...den number dem n match it..haha..so weird...joak mostly go wif berwin..haha...den mi n qin koi...lol...fun sia 2dae!!!!!..1 of de best dae in my life...!!!!!!!!

2dae so fun...play ball frm 1 to 5.50...so shuang..during tt time gt war between de bois sia...can throw things frm 3rd floor to de bball court...shiok..throw fruits sumore..i pity de apples n oranges..haiz~..all so childish..can throw fan cover sumore...haiz~~..i call dis de east spring war..lol..lame rite!!..oh yah..my bball skill improve liao...can almost 3 pointer liao..so happi..heheh...2dae can have a gd sleep coz had a gd exercise..heheh

hmm....2dae went to sakae sushi eat lunch..den amelia n joanne called mi to go eastpoint eat..den dun want...rather eat at airport den ep..suddenly dey cum juz to eat n meet mi...so surprised sia..den after dey eat went to bugis..took neoprint..haha..so funni..amelia de "head leader"..!!!...lol..laugh until like hell..all de prints she in front..haha..make her a "scapegoat"....den later bought dinnet at loyang point..fell along de way n almost hit de branch while doing de mambo..stupid amelia...laugh...den afterwards play at playground..amelia slipped...now my n joakey turn to laugh at her...HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!!!!..laugh until head frop off..heheh...go hm have to wait for bus for 45 min...stupid bus...hate bus 9..have to wait so long juz for 2 stops...deifnitely not worth it...den cum hm..bath..eat..n here i am..writing a new blog!!
